channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street needs a name road sign, 25th July
item.description:
This part of Little Grebe Road is unsigned. As the street continues around the corner, it causes a lot of confusion. Please help sort itâ€¦ The element of the street that is at 90degreed is signed..
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Little Grebe Road, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Public alleyway, 25th July
item.description:
This alleyway is forever a nuisance to local residence. Dog mess left daily, youths on quad bikes dangerously speeding up and down it at different hours of the night, youths smoking illegal substances and lots of the empty cannister left. This is a family neighbourhood and it stops us from allowing our children to play outside due to smells of weed. Also it's very dangerous leaving property as our path leads onto path of alleyway and fast cyclists and quad bikes have a number of times nearly knocked over myself (I have mobility issues and am on crutches) and my children 1 of which is autistic and becomes very anxious.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 86 Pennine Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous potholes on Pittville Circus Road, 25th July
item.description:
Numerous potholes that have been there for months, getting worse every week
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 3 Irving House Pittville Circus Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Tall grass blocks view, 25th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A417, Witcombe

item.title: Overgrowth along foot/bicycle path, 25th July
item.description:
The thorny plants along the Sandford Park path next to the Chelt reaches into the pedestrian side causing everyone to walk on the bicycle path. Dangerous, either get clawed by thorns or almost knocked over by cyclist. Park is well kept, why no trim the thorny bushes also?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 22 High Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree breaking through pavement, 25th July
item.description:
The tree has started rooting in my garden I think the roots may do damage to the drains in the area. It is breaking up the path in front of my house. An is leaning over so could cause damage to my house.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 41 Shakespeare Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: At Location - quantity of metal materials from a fire and other waste, 25th July
item.description:
The location is the Old Quarry entrance - off the Cleeve Common Road and mainly behind the entrance wall to the Cotswold Way footpath. Fires have been set there and residual metal items + an additional dump have left quite a mess. Please can it be cleared up.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Dingle, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Genuine fly-tipping!, 22nd July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 8 Saint Paul's Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Looks like burst watermain. road on far side risen above the pavment and starting to sink on the other. a crack in nearside side has formed and is growning., 22nd July
item.description:
Looks like burst water main. the road on the far side risen above the pavement and starting to sink on the other. a crack in the nearside side has formed and is growing. This started about 50 mins ago and is worsening by the minute.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Priors Road, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Not detecting bicycles., 21st July
item.description:
The induction loops at these traffic lights approaching from Hayden Road do not detect bicycles. Would it be possible to increase the gain on the circuit? I have to wait for a motor vehicle to pull up behind or next to me before the lights will change in my favour.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Appletree Cottage Hayden Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hole in the pavement, 21st July
item.description:
There's a hole in the pavement. Somebody has painted a white circle around it, but I'm not convinced that a walker will see a painted circle in the dark. It would be easy to turn your ankle in the hole. It needs filling in. Location is Liddington Road, between the entrance to the alleyway and the corner of the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 21 Liddington Road, Elmbridge
Report on FixMyStreet
